additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, PEG-60 Almond Glycerides, Propylene Glycol, Linoleamidopropyl Pg-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Panthenol, Panthenyl Ethyl Ether, Histidine, Niacinamide, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: If in eyes, wash out immediately with water
